english.segment1: I want to go where I can know. All of Your mysteries. Leaning on You, being renewed. All for eternity
english.segment3: CHORUS. Glory rain down. Fill up my life. Open the gates. Open the skies. Glory rain down. Fill up my soul. Fill up my soul
english.segment4: I want to stay where I can praise. All of Your majesty. Living by faith, loving Your name. All for world to see.
